chunks.zh: 写一句你所知的计算机界名言名句。
chunks.en: Write a quote from the computing world that you know.

chunks.zh:
"Any application that can be written in JavaScript, willeventually be written in JavaScript."  ——Jeff Atwood
“任何能够用 JavaScript 实现的应用系统，最终都必将用 JavaScript 实现。”  ——杰夫·阿特伍德
chunks.en:
"Any application that can be written in JavaScript, willeventually be written in JavaScript." ——Jeff Atwood
“Any application that can be written in JavaScript, will eventually be written in JavaScript.” ——Jeff Atwood

chunks.zh: NVIDIA, FUCK YOU ——Linus Torvalds
chunks.en: NVIDIA, FUCK YOU ——Linus Torvalds

chunks.zh: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
chunks.en: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.

chunks.zh: 计算机科学的两大难题：缓存淘汰，
chunks.en: Two major problems in computer science: cache eviction,

chunks.zh: 给东西命名，边界差一分布式系统的两大难题：2. 精准一次投递1. 确保消息顺序2. 精确一次投递https://martinfowler.com/bliki/TwoHardThings.html
chunks.en: naming things, off-by-one. Two major problems in distributed systems: 2. Exactly-Once Delivery 1. Ensuring message order 2. Exactly-Once Delivery https://martinfowler.com/bliki/TwoHardThings.html

chunks.zh: 手持两把锟斤拷，口中疾呼烫烫烫。 脚踏千朵屯屯屯，笑看万物锘锘锘。
chunks.en: Holding two Kunkiato, shouting Tangtangtang. Stepping on a thousand Tuntuntun, watching everything Nuonuo.

chunks.zh: No Silver Bullet 没有银弹
chunks.en: No Silver Bullet

chunks.zh: 又不是不能用
chunks.en: It's not unusable.

chunks.zh: Putty 本无树，MinGW 亦非台
chunks.en: Putty has no tree, MinGW is not a platform either

chunks.zh: @atpex nonono, 就是 just do IT 哈哈
chunks.en: @atpex nonono, just do IT haha

chunks.zh: 难道不是那句经典的 talk is cheap, show me the code
chunks.en: Isn't it the classic talk is cheap, show me the code?

chunks.zh: @dfkjgklfdjg 拍！黄！片！
chunks.en: @dfkjgklfdjg Shoot! Porn!

chunks.zh: 过早的优化是万恶之源。
chunks.en: Premature optimization is the root of all evil.

chunks.zh: 代码和人，有一个能跑就行
chunks.en: Code and people, as long as one can run.

chunks.zh: 最后只剩 6 个名额
chunks.en: Only 6 spots left.

chunks.zh: keep it simple,stupid
chunks.en: keep it simple, stupid

chunks.zh: Across the Great Wall, we can reach every corner in the world”（越过长城，走向世界每个角落）
chunks.en: Across the Great Wall, we can reach every corner in the world (Across the Great Wall, reach every corner of the world)

chunks.zh: 能用就行
chunks.en: As long as it works.

chunks.zh: No news is good news
chunks.en: No news is good news

chunks.zh: 这么简单的需求要一周？半天就好了吧
chunks.en: This simple requirement takes a week? Half a day is enough.

chunks.zh: PHP 是世界上最好的语言！
chunks.en: PHP is the best language in the world!

chunks.zh: Programming languages should be designed not by piling feature on top of feature, but by removing the weaknesses and restrictions that make additional features appear necessary.编程语言的设计不应该是在特性上堆砌特性，而应该消除使得多余特性显得必要的弱点与限制。
chunks.en: Programming languages should be designed not by piling feature on top of feature, but by removing the weaknesses and restrictions that make additional features appear necessary. The design of programming languages should not be to pile features on top of features, but to eliminate the weaknesses and limitations that make redundant features appear necessary.
